VLIB Function Reference

Kalman Filter

Introduction and Use Cases

The Kalman filter is an efficient recursive method to estimate the state of a process from partial observations. It is used in a wide variety of vision problems, such as object tracking, background estimation, etc.

Specification

Function

The Kalman filter is implemented as two separate functions, one for the time update (or prediction) and the other for the measurement update (or correction). This implementation assumes a pre-determined fixed dimension for the observation and state vectors.
  1. Kalman Filter 1x2 : The observation vector should be of dimension 1x1,and the state vector should have dimension 2x1.
  2. Kalman Filter 2x4 : The observation vector should be of dimension 2x1,and the state vector should have dimension 4x1.
  3. Kalman Filter 4x6 : The observation vector should be of dimension 4x1,and the state vector should have dimension 6x1.
  4. Kalman Filter 4x8 : The observation vector should be of dimension 4x1,and the state vector should have dimension 8x1.
  5. Kalman Filter 4x12 : The observation vector should be of dimension 4x1,and the state vector should have dimension 12x1.

Variants

This functionality is available in 3 variants:
  • S16 : Q-format fixed point
  • F32 : floating point (for C66)
  • S16_F32 : floating point output with S16 inputs and outputs (for C66)

APIS

S16:
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_2x4_Predict
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_2x4_Correct
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_4x6_Predict
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_4x6_Correct

F32:

  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_1x2_Predict_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_1x2_Correct_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_2x4_Predict_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_2x4_Correct_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_4x6_Predict_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_4x6_Correct_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_4x8_Predict_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_4x8_Correct_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_4x12_Predict_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_4x12_Correct_F32

S16_F32:

  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_2x4_Predict_S16_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_2x4_Correct_S16_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_4x6_Predict_S16_F32
  • VLIB_kalmanFilter_4x6_Correct_S16_F32
